```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Data

```{r}
data <- read_csv("gdp.csv")
```

```{r}
data %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = `2012`:`2021`,
               names_to = "Year",values_to = "GDP") %>%
   mutate(Year = as.numeric(Year),
          GDP = as.numeric(GDP)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Year, y = GDP)) +
  geom_point()
```
